data.title: Retake Seize for B Site Spike Planter from B Tunnel
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective retake Seize for behind the Pillar at the center of B Site.

data.title: Front A Site Haunt from A Shop
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Haunt for the front of A Site, that can be thrown from A Shop. You should use this when you are confident that you won't be picked off from enemy players playing from close angles on the front side of A site.
